docs.text:
Home


Welcome to the documentation site for 
Spot the Docs
. Here's where you can find installation guidelines, deployment questions, and contributor guidelines.


About 
Spot the Docs


Spot the Docs
 is an app that uses GitHub's API to find open-source projects in need of documentation contributors.


To learn more, visit the 
About
 page.


There are four main sections within the 
Spot the Docs
 documentation site:




Installation


Deploying


Contribution Guidelines


FAQs




Demo


Here's the 
live demo
.


Installation


Deploying


Contribution Guidelines


FAQs

docs.title: About Spot the Docs

docs.text:
About 
Spot the Docs


Spot the Docs is a lightweight Laravel/Heroku web app that finds open-source projects with documentation issues using GitHub's API.




GitHub


Heroku




Commands


Using MKDocs




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project Layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    about.md  # The about page.
docs.title: About
